full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice - E6TOR-23RM05 Office Trailer Rental

**Title:** [English] E6TOR-23RM05 Office Trailer Rental, [French] E6TOR-23RM05 Bureau de location de remorques

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4585465436-Doc4587482600
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-15
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-31T14:00:00 (amended from the original due date)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-05-31

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status (English):** Open
* **Tender Status (French):** Ouvert

## Industry Classification

* **Industry Classification Code (UNSPC):** *72121102, 80131505, 95141700*
	+ **UNSPC Description (English):** Commercial and office building prefabricated erection service, portable or modular office rental service, prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings and structures.
	+ **UNSPC Description (French):** Service de montage d'immeubles commerciaux et de bureaux préfabriqués, service de location de bureau modulaire ou portatif, structures et bâtiments commerciaux et industriels préfabriqués.

## Tender Information

* **Trade Agreements:** *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), etc. (for the complete list, please refer to the tender notice)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Strategy:** Request for Supply Arrangement

## Contact Information

* **Procuring Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** David Barltrop
* **Contact Email:** david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Notice

Please refer to the tender notice attached below for more details.

[Tender Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19710335?extsite=MTk3MTAzMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19710335?extsite=MTk3MTAzMzVfQU4w
